Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Jio Financial Services are:Net Sales at Rs 148.90 crore in September 2023 up 4947.46% from Rs. 2.95 crore in September 2022.

articles.author: Sai Aravindh
articles.title: Investors Should Be Cautious As Small-Cap Rally Is Over, Says Abhay Agarwal - BQ Prime
articles.description: The rally was largely fueled by inflows received by the domestic mutual funds, focusing on the mid- and small-cap space, he said.
articles.content:
Investors should be cautious, as the rally in mid- and small-cap stocks is largely over, according to Piper Serica Pvt.'s Abhay Agarwal.
